faculties_accepted: Faculty of Arts (excluding School of Management)
module_restrictions: If you are considering modules at 3000 level or above, you should have significant background knowledge of the subject (usually two years of study at university).
Postgraduate modules are not open to undergraduate exchange students.

visa_info.standard_visitor_visa: If your course of studies is less than 6 months, you will request entry to the UK as a Standard Visitor when you arrive.
visa_info.student_visa: You need a Student Visa for a full-year exchange in St Andrews.

accommodations_info.university_accommodation: Exchange students who are undergraduates are guaranteed university housing provided you return the housing form by the deadlines.  However, preference of room is not guaranteed. For more information, please refer to https://www.st-andrews.ac.uk/study-abroad/at-st-andrews/applying/accommodation/

cost_of_living: Information on cost of living can be found at https://www.st-andrews.ac.uk/students/money/internationalstudents/ugcoa/
